intro.description:
Welcome to the code review
Remember: get a second pair of eyes, and follow the steps below so that we don't overlook anything.
Never forget that common sense and good judgment is more important than technology or coolness.

item.title: Compute code proportions
item.description: Code proportions are normally already computed. Press the button if you want to force a full re-compute.

item.title: Run all unit tests
item.description: Run all unit tests to make sure there is no problem in the workspace you are unaware of.
